explanation: To complete the task of warming a chalice in the microwave and placing it back, placing a warmed wine glass in the cabinet, and cooking the ice cream cup and putting it in the cabinet, the relevant objects needed from the current environment are: Cup (to cook the ice cream cup), Chalice (to warm in the microwave), Wine glass (to warm and place in the cabinet), Ice cream cup (to cook), Cabinet (to place the warmed wine glass and cooked ice cream cup), and Microwave (to warm the chalice).
